MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 12-JAN-2021 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the PA3 postcode area of Paisley. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.15pm to renew a service cable at 6 Brick Lane and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.38pm on Tuesday 12th January 2021.
